data.title: Hiring Assessment
data.statement:
As hiring manager for {{7}} new development jobs, you want to hire only candidates that have done great on your coding test! Candidates should get at least{{900}} points out of {{1000}} to be considered.

You want to hire the people with the highest [[testScore]] first. In case candidates are tied, the tiebreaker is the greater number of [[challengesSolved]], then the greater number of [[forumPosts]].

If all three are tied, choose the candidate with the lower [[candidateID]]. Remember that you may only hire {{7}}.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read candidateID:int testScore:int challengesSolved:int forumPosts:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: Single integer [[N]], the number of candidates

Then, <<[[N]] lines of {{4}} integers>>, separated by a space (" ")
- [[candidateID]]
- [[testScore]]
- [[challengesSolved]]
- [[forumPosts]]
data.outputDescription:
A single line, with a space-delimited list of the selected candidates, in order of preference.
If no candidates meet the requirements, output {{None}}

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

As hiring manager for 7 new development jobs, you want to hire only candidates that have done great on your coding test! Candidates should get at least900 points out of 1000 to be considered.

You want to hire the people with the highest testScore first. In case candidates are tied, the tiebreaker is the greater number of challengesSolved, then the greater number of forumPosts.

If all three are tied, choose the candidate with the lower candidateID. Remember that you may only hire 7.
Input
Line 1: Single integer N, the number of candidates

Then, N lines of 4 integers, separated by a space (" ")
- candidateID
- testScore
- challengesSolved
- forumPosts
Output
A single line, with a space-delimited list of the selected candidates, in order of preference.
If no candidates meet the requirements, output None
Constraints
1<=N<=100
1<=testScore<=1000
Example
Input
4
3 729 39 3
4 932 112 93
2 690 22 0
1 898 5 0
Output
4
